comment: Very sweet.  Lots of floral flavor.
On sale for 9 or 10$ originally 79$, and that says it all. Very fruity nose, almost peaty smoke taste versus hops. I personally find it unpalatable.
IPA whiskey...taste of hops at the end. Interesting
Nice but hops come off as medicinal.
Hops are lemony but a little skunky.

Ramirez Liquor has for $69.99
Liquor Mart has for  $79.99
